title: A spirituall combat a tryall of a faithfull soule or consolation in temptation. Written in French by I.P. Camus Bishope of Belley, and translated into English by M.C. P. of the Eng. Coll. of Doway.
author: Camus, Jean-Pierre, 1584-1652.
publicationStmtPublisher: By the widowe of Mark Wyon, at the signe of the Phoenix,
